Articles.Content:
Its from Bohemia Interactive studio - creators of Arma mil sims.

http://mars.takeonthegame.com/about

I will keep my eye on this one for sure.
Ooooh. Looks good! This is yet another game to add to my watch list.

Not really, I mean, they made 2 Military Simulators that real military personnel use, and their hit games: ARMA I, ARMA II and ARMA III

They are hardcore sims

Bohemia interactive is a hardcore sim company, the Arma series is amazing, they put time money and research into bullet trajectories in different enviroments for their different maps in Arma. If they put nearly as much care into Take On Mars as they did with the Arma's it will be an amazing simulator!

Just watched a Dev Interview on the Game, and they say they got alot of their motivation due to the success of KSP! Good that Squad are definitely getting their name out there. Take On Mars does look interesting, and I'll definitely be getting it, but I'm not sure where this game could go in the long run, the waypoints and sht are kinda a turn off for the entertainment factor. I'd rather have the need to follow Co-ordinates, than follow a Marker.
Interesting, definnatly going to keep an eye on it.
